verbs.description: [V: Embattled] [ARG1: Deputy Attorney] General Rod Rosenstein took a break from his day job – and occasional target for President Trump 's fury – to argue a case before the Supreme Court .
[ARG0: Embattled Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein] [V: took] [ARG1: a break from his day job – and occasional target for President Trump 's fury – to argue a case before the Supreme Court] .

[ARG0: Embattled Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein] took a break from his day job – and occasional target for President Trump 's fury – to [V: argue] [ARG1: a case] [ARGM-LOC: before the Supreme Court] .
